meanings.definition: A person who maintains the grounds of a property.
meanings.sent1: The groundskeeper mowed the lawn at the park.
meanings.sent2: The school hired a groundskeeper to take care of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The groundskeeper joked that the grass was his best friend.
meanings.sent4: She was the groundskeeper of her own happiness, tending to it with care.
meanings.sent5: The groundskeeper's dedication to the job was unmatched, making the garden flourish.

meanings.definition: The act of keeping the grounds in good condition.
meanings.sent1: Regular maintenance is essential for proper groundskeeper.
meanings.sent2: The groundskeeper of the golf course ensured the grass was always green.
meanings.sent3: The groundskeeper of cleanliness, he swept away any mess in his path.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was her groundskeeper, nurturing beauty in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The groundskeeper of order, he meticulously arranged everything in its place.
